#### GIT FOLLOW UPS

| COMMAND                 | EFFECT                                                                         |
| ----------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| `git pull main`         | `Checkout to the main branch, this will up-to-date your local with remote`     |
| `git merge origin/main` | `Merges all the up-to-date changes of your local main to local feature branch` |
